title: Competency-Based Science Learning Experience Analysis and Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and basic proficiency in mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Activity-based learning combined with reflective practice in limited technological environments (primarily smartphones) for science-related job competency enhancement

learning_goals: Learners will analyze knowledge-skills-attitudes (KSA) components constituting core competencies in science experiment design with ≥80% accuracy within six months.
Learners will record and self-assess ≥3 scientific problem-solving experiences in contexts resembling real-world job scenarios via weekly activity-based learning modules.
Learners will reflect ≥90% of competency development insights gained from self-confrontation interviews into project-based assessments to finalize deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
